question: Which of the following best depict the view of Gandhiji?
option1: All old traditions should be followed
option2: All old traditions should be discarded
option3: Only scientifically based traditions should be followed
option4: Those traditions should not be followed which are against our moral values
answer: Those traditions should not be followed which are against our moral values
explanation: Gandhiji said that it is good to swim in the waters of tradition but to sink in them is suicide. Traditions are not cast in stone. By their very nature, they are supposed to evolve constantly and meet the changing requirements of time and social contexts.
